TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Mabanan, title = Mabanan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mabanan} }

S.FORM: == Mabanan == u sulit nu Hulam 永安部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Miaoli a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Mabanan. u kasalumaluma' nu Mabanan sa, 87 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 235 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 221 ku tademaw, pakalatu 94%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 14 ku tademaw, pakalatu 6%. u kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 92%, Paywan(Paiwan) 1%. u Tayan a niyazu' u Tayan a niyazu' kuyni, katuud ku Tayan a tademaw itini. u zuma a tademaw sa u Pangcah, u Yuwatan, u Taluku, inayi' tu ku zuma a cidakay itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Incumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah, saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah. tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bulad pulung sausi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yuwatan (58,336), Rukay (13,303), Puyuma (14,118), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taluku (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laaluwa (398), Kanakanabu (330), zuma (12,320) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052)

== Mabanan == o solit no Holam 永安部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Miaoli a kowan ko niyazo' no Mabanan. o kasalomaloma' no Mabanan sa, 87 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 235 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 221 ko tademaw, pakalato 94%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 14 ko tademaw, pakalato 6%. o kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 92%, Paywan(Paiwan) 1%. o Tayan a niyazo' o Tayan a niyazo' koyni, katood ko Tayan a tademaw itini. o zoma a tademaw sa o Pangcah, o Yowatan, o Taloko, inayi' to ko zoma a cidakay itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Incomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah, saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah. tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bolad polong saosi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yowatan (58,336), Rokay (13,303), Poyoma (14,118), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taloko (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laalowa (398), Kanakanabo (330), zoma (12,320) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052)
